import yaml
import os
import shutil
    with open(f'{"people"}.yaml','r') as f:
        pl = yaml.safe_load(f)
    print(pl)

imlist = os.listdir("img")
new = pl.copy()
try:
    os.mkdir('../people')
except:
    pass
for n in range(len(pl)): #len(pl))
    
    p = pl[n]
    new1 = new[n]
    sn = (p['name'].replace(" ", "")).lower()

    new1 = {'title':p['name']}
    #new[n]['title'] = p['name']
    impath = False
    for im in imlist:
        #print(im)
        #print(sn)
        if sn in im:
            impath = im 
    if impath != False:
        image = impath
    else:
        image = "portrait_placeholder.png"#../assets/img/portrait_placeholder.png"


    
    new1['title'] = p['name']
    new1['description'] = p['applications'][0]
    new1['image'] = image
    
    if 'categories' in p:
        if 'committee' in p['categories']:
            new1['categories'] = ['committee']
    else:    
        new1['categories'] = []
    if 'social' in p:
        new1['links'] =[]
        if 'github' in p['social'] :
            #p['links'] =  '<a href=https://github.com/'+ str(p['social']['github'])+ '><i class=\"fab fa-github\"></i></a>'+'<a href='+str(p['social']['website'])+'><i class=\"fas fa-globe\"></i></a>'
            new1['links'] += ['<a href=https://github.com/'+ str(p['social']['github'])+ ' class="btn btn-primary">Github</a>']
        if 'website' in p['social']:
            #p['links'] =  '<a href='+str(p['social']['website'])+'><i class=\"fas fa-globe\"></i></a>'
            new1['links'] += ['<a href='+ str(p['social']['website'])+ ' class="btn btn-secondary">Website</a>']
    
    new1['links'] = (''.join(new1['links']))
    if 'techniques' in p:
        new1['techniques'] = p['techniques']
    if 'applications' in p:
        new1['applications'] = p['applications']
        keywords = ['cnn', 'convolution', 'neural network', 'pinn']        
        if any(any(x) for x in[[f in e for f in keywords] for e in [s.lower() for s in p['techniques']]]   ):
            new1['categories']+= ['Deep Learning']

        keywords = ['cnn', 'convolution', 'segmentation']        
        if any(any(x) for x in[[f in e for f in keywords] for e in [s.lower() for s in p['techniques']]]   ):
            new1['categories']+= ['CNN']
        keywords = ['forest', 'boost', 'tree']        
        if any(any(x) for x in[[f in e for f in keywords] for e in [s.lower() for s in p['techniques']]]   ):
            new1['categories']+= ['Decision Trees']
        keywords = ['pinn', 'informed']        
        if any(any(x) for x in[[f in e for f in keywords] for e in [s.lower() for s in p['techniques']]]   ):
            new1['categories']+= ['PINNS']
    new1['about'] = {}
    new1['about']['id'] = 'person-profile'
    new1['about']['template'] = 'jolla'
    #new1['about']['links'] = {}
    # if 'social' in p:
    #     if 'github' in p['social'] :
    #         new1['about']['links']['icon'] = 'fab fa-github'
    #         new1['about']['links']['text'] = 'github'
    #         new1['about']['links']['href'] = p['social']['github']
    #new1['about']['id'] = 'person-profile'
    #new1['about']['template'] = 'jolla'

    print(image)
    os.chdir('../people')
    try:
        os.mkdir(str(sn))
    except:
        pass
    os.chdir(str(sn))
    shutil.copyfile("../../assets/img/"+image, image)
    with open(str(sn)+'.qmd', 'w') as outfile:
        yaml.dump(new1, outfile, sort_keys=False, default_flow_style=False) 

    f = open(str(sn)+'.qmd','r')
    lines = f.readlines() # read old content
    f.close()

    newf = open(str(sn)+'.qmd','w')
    newf.write("---"+ "\n") # write new content at the beginning
    for line in lines: # write old content after new
        newf.write(line)
    newf.write("---"+ "\n")
    newf.write("   "+ "\n")
    newf.write(":::{#person-profile}"+ "\n")
    
    newf.write(":::"+ "\n")
    newf.write("   "+ "\n")
    if 'techniques' in p:
       
        newf.write("##"+ "\n")
        newf.write("## Techniques"+ "\n")
        newf.write("   "+ "\n")
        for a in p['techniques']:
            newf.write("- "+str(a)+ "\n")
    

    newf.write("   "+ "\n")
    if 'applications' in p:
        newf.write("##"+ "\n")
        newf.write("## Research area"+ "\n")

        newf.write("   "+ "\n")
        for a in p['applications']:
            newf.write("- "+str(a)+ "\n")

    
    newf.close()
    


    os.chdir('../../assets')

for n in range(len(pl)):
    
    p = pl[n]
    
    sn = (p['name'].replace(" ", "")).lower()

    new[n] = {'title':p['name']}
    #new[n]['title'] = p['name']
    impath = False
    for im in imlist:
        #print(im)
        #print(sn)
        if sn in im:
            impath = im 
    if impath != False:
        image = "img/"+impath
    else:
        image = "portrait_placeholder.png)"#../assets/img/portrait_placeholder.png"
    new[n]['title'] = p['name']
    new[n]['subtitle'] = p['applications'][0]
    new[n]['image'] = image
    if 'categories' in p:
        if 'committee' in p['categories']:
            new[n]['categories'] = ['committee']
    else:    
        new[n]['categories'] = []
    if 'social' in p:
        new[n]['links'] =[]
        if 'github' in p['social'] :
            #p['links'] =  '<a href=https://github.com/'+ str(p['social']['github'])+ '><i class=\"fab fa-github\"></i></a>'+'<a href='+str(p['social']['website'])+'><i class=\"fas fa-globe\"></i></a>'
            new[n]['links'] += ['<a href=https://github.com/'+ str(p['social']['github'])+ ' class="btn btn-primary">Github</a>']
        if 'website' in p['social']:
            #p['links'] =  '<a href='+str(p['social']['website'])+'><i class=\"fas fa-globe\"></i></a>'
            new[n]['links'] += ['<a href='+ str(p['social']['website'])+ ' class="btn btn-secondary">Website</a>']
    
    if 'techniques' in p:
        keywords = ['cnn', 'convolution', 'neural network', 'pinn']        
        if any(any(x) for x in[[f in e for f in keywords] for e in [s.lower() for s in p['techniques']]]   ):
            new[n]['categories']+= ['Deep Learning']

        keywords = ['cnn', 'convolution', 'segmentation']        
        if any(any(x) for x in[[f in e for f in keywords] for e in [s.lower() for s in p['techniques']]]   ):
            new[n]['categories']+= ['CNN']
        keywords = ['forest', 'boost', 'tree']        
        if any(any(x) for x in[[f in e for f in keywords] for e in [s.lower() for s in p['techniques']]]   ):
            new[n]['categories']+= ['Decision Trees']
        keywords = ['pinn', 'informed']        
        if any(any(x) for x in[[f in e for f in keywords] for e in [s.lower() for s in p['techniques']]]   ):
            new[n]['categories']+= ['PINNS']
    print(image)
with open('people_processed.yml', 'w') as outfile:
    yaml.dump(new, outfile, sort_keys=False, default_flow_style=False)
